features.title: Screenshot Feature
features.description:
Capture screenshots directly from the preview panel to share with Rocket.
Added screenshot capture functionality in the preview panel, allowing you to capture full screen or selected area screenshots.
Drag and drop captured screenshots directly into the chat input to share them with Rocket for faster iteration and clearer communication.
See the Preview guide for details.

features.title: React and Next.js Language Support
features.description: React projects only support JavaScript, and Next.js projects only support TypeScript.

features.title: Smart Suggestions
features.description:
Rocket now provides intelligent suggestions to help you build faster.
Added smart suggestions that analyze your project context and building patterns to automatically suggest personalized ideas for what to build next.
Click any suggestion to convert it into a prompt in the chat input, making it easier to discover and implement new features.
See the Chat interface guide for details.

features.title: New command support
features.description: We added support for more built-in commands across Rocket, so you can run common actions with short, fixed triggers instead of long prompts.

features.title: Flutter SDK package validation
features.description: PackageRegistryTool now validates built-in Flutter SDK packages, so invalid or mismatched dependencies are caught before they cause issues.

features.title: Next.js (JS/TS) support
features.description: Build Next.js apps in JavaScript or TypeScript, complete with Rocket integrations (Auth, DB, Storage, Analytics, Providers). Generate, wire up, and deploy without extra setup.

features.title: React (TypeScript) support
features.description: Spin up React (TS) projects with the same end-to-end integration support. Strong typing, cleaner refactors, and a smoother path to production.

features.title: Flutter: dropdown package compatibility
features.description: We’ve adjusted dropdown-related package versions for better compatibility with Flutter version used. Fewer conflicts, more reliable builds.

features.title: Smarter Supabase migrations
features.description: Migration generation now uses richer context, producing more accurate scripts and reducing mismatches on reruns.

features.title: Faster AI responses
features.description: Streaming replies are now snappier, so answers feel more real‑time and fluid.

features.title: Clearer Android APK downloads
features.description: You’ll see a friendly queue message while your APK is being prepared, plus a simple summary when it’s ready to download.

features.title: More reliable Flutter packages
features.description: We now avoid unstable “pre‑release” package versions by default, keeping your Flutter builds steady and predictable.

features.title: Auto‑run for common commands
features.description: Safe, routine actions can run automatically to save you clicks, while you stay in control.

features.title: Token rollover policy
features.description: Unused tokens carry over to the next month. For yearly plans, rollover applies only within your 12‑month term and resets at renewal. Learn more on the Pricing Plans page.

features.title: Google Authentication for Flutter
features.description: Enable sign in with Google in your Flutter apps. Faster onboarding and fewer drop offs.

features.title: Commands & Context
features.description: Use Commands and Context to make precise, scoped changes without back and forth. Clear intent and cleaner results.

features.title: APK Agent
features.description: A new build time helper that detects and resolves common APK errors automatically. Android builds ship without the snags.

features.title: Flutter Package Identification
features.description: Improved detection and mapping of Flutter packages to the correct versions. Fewer mismatches and more reliable builds.

features.title: Faster Code Generation
features.description: Rocket now delivers code in just 3 minutes instead of 10, helping you move faster.

features.title: Smoother Integrations
features.description: Connecting services like Claude, OpenAI, Google Analytics, Perplexity, Gemini, and AdSense is now simpler and more reliable.

features.title: Amazon Bedrock Support
features.description: Rocket now has Amazon Bedrock as an additional provider, giving you more flexibility and reliability during code generation.

features.title: Smarter Model Switching
features.description: Rocket automatically switches to a backup provider if one is unavailable, so your build won’t stall.

features.title: Flutter Package Guidance
features.description: Rocket suggests the right versions for Flutter packages and keeps template packages safe during updates to prevent errors.

features.title: Supabase Improvements
features.description:
Schema and migration scripts now show clearer messages.
Generated AuthContext.jsx is easier to read and less prone to errors.

features.title: Fixed Code Generation Retry
features.description:
When AI generation produces an empty result, Rocket now shows “failed” instead of marking it as completed.
You can retry immediately instead of getting stuck.
Fewer empty responses mean more consistent builds.

features.title: Better Error Visibility
features.description:
Supabase runtime errors now appear directly in the UI.
You can spot backend issues at a glance.
Debug faster without digging through logs.

features.title: Twilio SMS Integration
features.description: Rocket now connects with Twilio so your apps can send SMS messages instantly.

features.title: Smarter Agent
features.description:
Improved Thinking: The agent now takes extra time to understand your query before acting, resulting in sharper and more accurate results.
Integration Suggestions: After app creation, the agent proactively recommends integrations to supercharge your app.
Enhanced Context Awareness: Better understanding of your app’s state such as active integrations and current screens for more relevant responses.

features.title: Google Maps for Flutter
features.description:
You can now add interactive Google Maps directly inside your Flutter apps.
Package Manager:
Fixed issues with follow-up requests, including wrong indentations, missing dependencies, and incorrect package versions.
Ensured new package versions align with the current Flutter SDK.

features.title: Clearer Error Handling
features.description:
A banner now appears in the UI when Rocket encounters LLM errors such as overload or inactivity.
Success messages are now smarter: when no code changes are needed, you’ll see a clear confirmation instead of the generic “Code has been generated successfully.”
Actual console errors are now retrieved via API and displayed in the UI, giving you more visibility and easier troubleshooting.

features.title: Smoother Integration Experience
features.description: Instead of asking for an integration key right after your first message, Rocket now suggests next steps, reducing confusion and making setup friendlier.

features.title: Long Thread Improvements
features.description: Better context handling in long threads (2000+ messages) keeps your conversations sharp and relevant.

features.title: Connect to Custom Domains
features.description: You can now link your Rocket app to your own domain. No external setup required.

features.title: Download APKs from Rocket
features.description: Get an installable Android APK for your app with a single click. No need for external build tools.

features.title: Figma to Flutter
features.description:
Faster Code Generation: Code generation time reduced by 35-40%.
Expanded Component Support: Now supports 50+ components with dynamic library integration for greater flexibility.
Enhanced Component Detection: Improved accuracy ensures cleaner, more maintainable code.
Improved Code Quality: More consistent color naming and better custom component structuring.

features.title: Supabase Storage
features.description: Upload, retrieve, and manage files directly in Rocket with zero setup required.

features.title: Backup LLM Provider Support
features.description: We’ve added support for an alternate LLM provider to reduce downtime and keep Rocket responsive.

features.title: Supabase Integration with Existing Databases
features.description:
You can now connect Rocket to your existing Supabase projects, even if they already have data, tables, and structure set up.
Before: Only new, empty Supabase projects were supported.
Now: Use your current database without starting over.
Why this matters:
Keep your existing data and schema.
Add features to live apps without disruption.
Build realistic demos and admin tools faster.

features.title: Smarter System Behavior
features.description:
Better understanding of instructions across multiple messages.
Rocket now remembers uploaded images when you reference them later.
Improved recognition of terms like “this screen” or “current screen.”
Faster screen list loading and UI response.
Rocket no longer repeats provider prompts if you choose to skip.

features.title: Performance & Reliability
features.description:
More accurate detection of changes when committing files.
Improved flow to avoid generating unnecessary screens.

features.title: Deployment Experience
features.description: Disabled publish button while preview is being generated to prevent accidental actions.

features.title: Classification & Context Handling
features.description:
Improved parsing for longer threads to correctly group tool usage and results.
Enhanced understanding of user instructions and context across messages.
Better image context linking across follow-ups.
Faster screen list display, independent of design theme loading.
Proactive error handling to guide recovery after repeated failures.

features.title: Web App Editing
features.description: Improved overall reliability and responsiveness of visual editing for web apps.
